verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O come all ye faithful, newline Joyful and triumphant, newline O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem; newline Come and behold Him, newline Born the King of angels:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O come, let us adore Him, newline O come, let us adore Him, newline O come, let us adore Him, newline Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God of God, newline Light of light, newline Lo! He abhors not the virgin's womb; newline Very God, newline Begotton not created:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Sing, choirs of angels, newline Sing in exultation, newline Sing all ye citizens of heaven above: newline Glory to God newline In the highest:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Yea, Lord, we greet Thee, newline Born this happy morning, newline Jesu, to Thee be glory given; newline Word of the Father, newline Now in flesh appearing:
